metadata.title: CVE-2024-6763 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Eclipse Jetty is a lightweight, highly scalable, Java-based web server andServlet engine . It includes a utility class, HttpURI, for URI/URL parsing.The HttpURI class does insufficient validation on the authority segment ofa URI.  However the behaviour of HttpURI differs from the common browsers in how it handles a URI that would beconsidered invalid if fully validated against the RRC.  SpecificallyHttpURI and the browser may differ on the value of the host extracted from aninvalid URI and thus a combination of Jetty and a vulnerable browser may be vulnerable to a open redirect attack or to a SSRF attack if the URIis used after passing validation checks.

criterions.comment: jetty9 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
